sentences.sentence: Domesticated plants and animals are examples of technos — logic applied to life.
sentences.translation: 驯化的动植物，正是将技术逻辑应用于生命的范例。

sentences.sentence: Yet at the same time that the logic of Bios is being imported into machines, the logic of Technos is being imported into life.
sentences.translation: 在人们将自然逻辑输入机器的同时，也把技术逻辑带到了生命之中。
